name: mn-webpack-builder
description: Builder Webpack en Typescript pour divers environnements

scripts.validate: npm run format && npm run lint && npm run typecheck

appScripts.start:desktop-preload: cross-env NODE_ENV=development PLATFORM=desktop-preload TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true webpack --config webpack/index.ts
appScripts.start:desktop-renderer: cross-env NODE_ENV=development PLATFORM=desktop-renderer webpack serve --config webpack/index.ts
appScripts.build:desktop-main: cross-env NODE_ENV=production PLATFORM=desktop-main TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true webpack --config webpack/index.ts
appScripts.build:desktop-renderer: cross-env NODE_ENV=production PLATFORM=desktop-renderer TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true webpack --config webpack/index.ts
appScripts.build:desktop: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node scripts/clean-build-desktop.js && concurrently "npm run build:desktop-main" "npm run build:desktop-renderer"
appScripts.compile:desktop: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build:desktop && node scripts/clean-package-desktop.js && electron-builder build --publish never
appScripts.package:desktop: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build:desktop && node scripts/clean-package-desktop.js && electron-builder build --publish always
appScripts.start:web: cross-env NODE_ENV=development PLATFORM=web webpack serve --config webpack/index.ts
appScripts.validate: npm run format && npm run lint && npm run typecheck
